title: Booo: Sabki Phategi
overview: Manav and his childhood friends reunite at his resort for a fun-cation. They are a bunch of pranksters and a newly-wed couple, excited to put their plans into action. However, all their romantic plans take a hilariously dangerous turn, when they realise that their holiday destination is haunted. Thus begins an experience of a horror-comedy among friends, which is rib-tickling but also spine-chillingâ€¦ Ab shuru hogi bhootiyagiri!
